text: Oleksiy Khoblenko (; born 4 April 1994) is a Ukrainian football striker. ==Career== Khoblenko is a product of the Elektron Romny, Yunist Chernihiv and Dynamo youth sportive schools. He spent his career in the Ukrainian First League club Dynamo-2 Kyiv. And during 2013–2014 went on loan for FC Poltava.
